title: The Stockholm Mule
authors: ["ogi"]

date: 2023/03/01
tableOfContent: false
---

Learn how to make a Moscow Mule alternative with the following recipe:

- 1/2 lime
- 4cl spicy whisky (e.g: « JACK DANIEL'S Tennessee Fire 35% »)
- 2cl amaretto
- 2 mint leaves
- ice
- fill with ginger beer
